items.title: US Supreme Court Ruth Bader Ginsburg released from hospital after gallbladder treatment

items.author: outhouse_steakhouse
items.title: A dolphin who used to play with tourists has become lonely during lockdown, so a fisherman has started going out every day to visit him.

items.author: West_Sir
items.title: India Becomes World’s 2nd Largest PPE Kit Producer In Just Two Months; Develops World’s First Reusable PPE Suit

items.author: Sulde
items.title: New Banksy artwork appears at Southampton hospital, left with a note from the artist. It read: "Thanks for all you're doing. I hope this brightens the place up a bit, even if it's only black and white."

items.author: cyanocittaetprocyon
items.title: Germany passes law banning 'gay conversion therapy' for minors

items.author: Systemantix
items.title: Germany's Bundestag passed a law which completely bans any so-called “therapy” that aims to change the sexual orientation of minors, and the crime will carry a prison sentence of up to one year | Health minister: “Homosexuality is not a disease. Therefore the term therapy is misleading.”

items.title: Thai Elephants walk 95 miles to home after 20 years of Work

items.author: Paracortex
items.title: A teen found $135,000 next to an ATM. Instead of walking away with it, he called police.

items.title: Gollum actor Andy Serkis will give a continuous live reading of The Hobbit live online to raise money for charity.
